title: India's loan scams leave victims scared for their lives
description: Bogus apps are being used by hackers to access mobile phone data to threaten and blackmail victims.

title: Elon Musk threatens to walk away from Twitter deal
description: The billionaire accuses the company of "thwarting" his requests to learn more about spam accounts.

title: Digital fingerprints of a million child abuse images made
description: A new system for classifying images will help stop them being shared online, a UK charity says.
